name: ICA_AROMA
author: Nipype (interface), Oxford Centre for Functional MRI of the Brain (FMRIB) (tool)
description: ICA_AROMA, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: ICA_AROMA).

inputs.name: Tr
inputs.description: A float. Tr in seconds. if this is not specified the tr will be extracted from the header of the fmri nifti file.

inputs.name: Denoise type
inputs.description: 'nonaggr' or 'aggr' or 'both' or 'no'. Type of denoising strategy:-no: only classification, no denoising-nonaggr (default): non-aggresssive denoising, i.e. partial component regression-aggr: aggressive denoising, i.e. full component regression-both: both aggressive and non-aggressive denoising (two outputs).

inputs.name: Dim
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Dimensionality reduction when running melodic (defualt is automatic estimation).

inputs.name: Feat dir
inputs.description: An existing directory name. If a feat directory exists and temporal filtering has not been run yet, ica_aroma can use the files in this directory.

inputs.name: Fnirt warp file
inputs.description: An existing file name. File name of the warp-file describing the non-linear registration (e.g. fsl fnirt) of the structural data to mni152 space (.nii.gz).

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: An existing file name. Volume to be denoised.

inputs.name: Mask
inputs.description: An existing file name. Path/name volume mask.

inputs.name: Mat file
inputs.description: An existing file name. Path/name of the mat-file describing the affine registration (e.g. fsl flirt) of the functional data to structural space (.mat file).

inputs.name: Melodic dir
inputs.description: An existing directory name. Path to melodic directory if melodic has already been run.

inputs.name: Motion parameters
inputs.description: An existing file name. Motion parameters file.

output-files.name: Aggr denoised file
output-files.description: An existing file name. If generated: aggressively denoised volume.

output-files.name: Nonaggr denoised file
output-files.description: An existing file name. If generated: non aggressively denoised volume.

output-files.name: Out dir
output-files.description: An existing directory name. Directory contains (in addition to the denoised files): melodic.ica + classified_motion_components + classification_overview + feature_scores + melodic_ic_mni).
